text: John Wayne Bobbitt (born March 23, 1967) and Lorena Bobbitt (née Gallo; born October 31, 1969) were an American couple married on June 18, 1989 and lived in Manassas, Virginia. Their relationship became well known in 1993 when, after claims of years of rape and abuse by her husband, Lorena cut off his penis with a knife while he was asleep in bed. The penis was surgically reattached. John was born in Buffalo, New York and Lorena was born in Guayas Province, Ecuador. John Bobbitt was acquitted on the rape charge. Lorena Bobbitt was found not guilty for reason of insanity.Virginia Vs. Lorena Bobbitt, Court TV. Courttv.com. Retrieved on October 14, 2012. In 1995, after six years of marriage, John and Lorena finalized their divorce. After the events, John starred in two pornographic movies in the 1990s and said in 2018 that his penis is "back to normal". Lorena was invited by President Abdalá Bucaram for an official dinner and later became godparents to each other's children in 1996. In December 1997, Lorena was charged with assault for punching her mother, Elvia Gallo, as they watched television. She was eventually acquitted of assault and in 2007, she founded Lorena's Red Wagon organization, which helps prevent domestic violence through family-oriented activities. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Couples Category:People acquitted of rape Category:American crime victims Category:American pornographic actors Category:Actors from Las Vegas Category:Actors from Virginia Category:Ecuadorian people Category:Actors from Buffalo, New York
